parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description:
The name of the action. Valid values:

*   start
*   stop
*   config
*   restart
*   refresh_queues
*   refresh_labels

parameters.name: BatchSize
parameters.description: The number of applications in each batch.

parameters.name: ExecuteStrategy
parameters.description:
The execution policy. Valid values:

*   FAILED_BLOCK: The system stops the execution if the execution fails.
*   FAILED_CONTINUE: The system continues the execution if the execution fails.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval for rolling execution. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: RollingExecute
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable rolling execution.
